document.full_text: the case of a grisly 2008 killing of 4-year-old girl ended this week with an israeli court finding the girl's paternal grandfather guilty of her murder and her mother of soliciting the killing.
document.title: grandfather is convicted of 2008 murder of child in israel
lines_and_colors: the case of a grisly 2008 killing of 4-year-old girl ended this week with an israeli court finding the girl's paternal grandfather guilty of her murder and her mother of soliciting the killing.
